sentence.Network_en: Their motives have never been satisfactorily explained.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的动机一直未得到令人满意的解释。

sentence.Network_en: The relations of friendly cooperation between our two countries are developing satisfactorily.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们两国的友好合作关系正在令人满意地发展着.

sentence.Network_en: We cannot yet satisfactorily explain the genesis of the universe.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们仍不能令人满意地解释宇宙的起源.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... satisfaction n． 满意；快事；赔偿 n．快事，乐事；愉 satisfactorily ad. 圆满地 saturation n． 饱和(状态)；浸透.
satisfaction 满意satisfactorily 满意地satisfactory 满意的
妥_百度百科 ... [properly] 十分合适，恰当 [satisfactorily] 令人满意地 [proper and convenient] 妥当适宜.
To solve a problem satisfactorily , you must overall consideration to it ., 处理问题必须全盘考虑才能圆满.

list.abs: noise problem will be satisfactorily resolved when the airport is relocated in April 1998 ., 飞机噪音问题在一九九八年四月机场搬迁后 , 将可圆满解决.
the problem will be solved satisfactorily in the end ., 这个问题终归会得到圆满的解决.
Canning Canning beef can be satisfactorily preserved by canning if the proper procedures are used., 装罐如果装罐步骤正确 , 牛肉可很好地保存起来.
he has finished the 5 required dives and 6 optional dives quite satisfactorily .他非常满意地完成了5个规定动作和6个自选动作。

entry.tran: 令人满意的;恰当的;合适的
entry.def: Something that is satisfactory is acceptable to you or fulfils a particular need or purpose.

example.ex: I never got a satisfactory answer...
example.tran: 我从未得到令我满意的答复。

example.ex: It seemed a very satisfactory arrangement...
example.tran: 这似乎是个非常令人满意的安排。

auth_sentence.content: The boy followed classroom regulations and performed satisfactorily in group work.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The boy followed classroom regulations and performed satisfactorily in group work.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: To explain that satisfactorily we need to look into the non-super symmetric case.

auth_sentence.content: None of the cases have been fully or satisfactorily investigated, said Colville.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: None of the cases have been fully or satisfactorily investigated, said Colville.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的
令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: un不+satisfactory令人满意的→adj.令人不满意的, 不能解决问题的, 不得人心的
satisfactory[adj.令人满意的,圆满的,良好的,符合要求的]+ly表副词→satisfactorily满意地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不满,不平,令人不满的事物
stems_affixes.word_buile: dissatisfy[v.使感觉不满, 不满足]+action表名词→dissatisfaction不满,不平
satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]+action表名词→satisfy的名词→satisfaction满足,满意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使感觉不满, 不满足
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis否定,不+satisfy[v.满意,使满意,使相信,说服]→v.使感觉不满, 不满足

stems_affixes.value_cn: 满意,使满意,使相信,说服

sentences.cn: 一切都得到了令人满意的安排。

sentences.en: The goods sampled out quite satisfactorily.
